# linePoints

**Type Property**

An array of floating point values that specifies the starting and ending points, in page-space coordinates, of a line.

## Declaration

```swift
static let linePoints: PDFAnnotationKey
```

## Configuring Line Properties

- **lineEndingStyles**: An array of string values that specifies the styles to use for the ends of lines.
- **PDFLineStyle**: The following constants specify the available line ending styles.
- **PDFAnnotationLineEndingStyle**

items.description: An array of string values that specifies the styles to use for the ends of lines.
items.name: lineEndingStyles

items.description: The following constants specify the available line ending styles.
